==== 4 February â Friday of Departure ====
â
The same organizers of the Day of Anger and "Friday of Anger" have called for a protest in front the presidential palace on 4 February dubbed the "'''Friday of Departure'''"<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.presstv.ir/detail/163162.html|title=Feb. 4 declared the 'Friday of departure'|author=|date=02 February 2011|work=PressTV|accessdate=02 February 2011}}</ref> ({{lang-ar|'''Ø¬ÙØ¹Ø© Ø§ÙØ±Ø­ÙÙ'''}})<ref>{{ar}}{{cite web|url=http://www.alraimedia.com/Alrai/Article.aspx?id=253982&date=02022011|title=Ø¬ÙØ¹Ø© Ø§ÙØ±Ø­ÙÙ|author=|date=02 February 2011|work=AlRaimedia|accessdate=02 February 2011}}</ref>. They warned that President Mubarak should step down immediately. They also stated the 4 February is the deadline for him to remain in power.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://news.sky.com/skynews/Home/World-News/Egypt-Protests-What-Will-Be-The-Future-For-President-Mubarak/Article/201102115920698?lpos=World_News_First_World_News_Article_Teaser_Region_4&lid=ARTICLE_15920698_Egypt_Protests%3A_What_Will_Be_The_Future_For_President_Mubarak|title=Ø®Ø§ÙØ¯ Ø§ÙØµØ§ÙÙ ÙÙÙØ¯ ÙØ¸Ø§ÙØ±Ø© ÙÙ ÙÙØ¯Ø§ÙWhat is The Future For President Mubarak?|author=|date=02 February 2011|work=Sky News|accessdate=02 February 2011}}</ref>
+
The same organizers of the "Day of Anger" and "Friday of Anger" have called for a protest in front the presidential palace on 4 February dubbed the "'''Friday of Departure'''"<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.presstv.ir/detail/163162.html|title=Feb. 4 declared the 'Friday of departure'|author=|date=02 February 2011|work=PressTV|accessdate=02 February 2011}}</ref> ({{lang-ar|'''Ø¬ÙØ¹Ø© Ø§ÙØ±Ø­ÙÙ'''}})<ref>{{ar}}{{cite web|url=http://www.alraimedia.com/Alrai/Article.aspx?id=253982&date=02022011|title=Ø¬ÙØ¹Ø© Ø§ÙØ±Ø­ÙÙ|author=|date=02 February 2011|work=AlRaimedia|accessdate=02 February 2011}}</ref>. They warned that President Mubarak should step down immediately. They also stated the 4 February is the deadline for him to remain in power.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://news.sky.com/skynews/Home/World-News/Egypt-Protests-What-Will-Be-The-Future-For-President-Mubarak/Article/201102115920698?lpos=World_News_First_World_News_Article_Teaser_Region_4&lid=ARTICLE_15920698_Egypt_Protests%3A_What_Will_Be_The_Future_For_President_Mubarak|title=Ø®Ø§ÙØ¯ Ø§ÙØµØ§ÙÙ ÙÙÙØ¯ ÙØ¸Ø§ÙØ±Ø© ÙÙ ÙÙØ¯Ø§ÙWhat is The Future For President Mubarak?|author=|date=02 February 2011|work=Sky News|accessdate=02 February 2011}}</ref>
